content.rendered:
The Route 14 Raid Den is found directly east of Route 6. Use Rock Climb to climb to the upper part of the island just north of a signpost, and then interact with the gap between two trees.

Location

Raid Pokémon

Pokémon Star Level
Golduck 3-Star, 4-Star, and 5-Star
Weepinbell 3-Star
